attributes.action: Mind UK's own business and stop meddling with India's internal affairs !
attributes.background: Recently viewed couple of petitions about discussing Kashmir in UK parliament. We people of India fail to understand that after ethnic cleansing done by the British in India, it has no business to put its nose into India's internal affairs. Kashmir is and will be the integral part of India!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
